steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(1), number_in_box(9), put_result_into_box(9)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(6), 1), increase(2)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(6), 1), number_in_box(4)), then_go_to_step(6), then_go_to_step(8)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(9), 2), increase(2)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(1), 1), number_in_box(6)), then_go_to_step(6), then_go_to_step(2)),
Put(number_in_box(3), into_box(4)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(9), 2), number_in_box(6)), then_go_to_step(1), then_go_to_step(4)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(6), 1), increase(1)),
Put(number_in_box(2), into_box(7)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 9?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在9号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Multiply: ( number in box 1 ) * ( number in box 9 ), put result into box 9.
Change Instruction 6: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 2
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 6 greater than ( number in box 4 )
Change Instruction 9: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 2
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 1 greater than ( number in box 6 )
Put ( number in box 3 ) into box 4
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 9 greater than ( number in box 6 )
Change Instruction 6: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Put ( number in box 2 ) into box 7
desc_zh: 相乘：1号盒子中的数字*9号盒子中的数字，将结果放在9号盒子中。
更改指令6：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加2
判断：指令6中第1个盒子的编号比4号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令9：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加2
判断：指令1中第1个盒子的编号比6号盒子中的数字大吗
将3号盒子中的数字放在4号盒子中
判断：指令9中第2个盒子的编号比6号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令6：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
将2号盒子中的数字放在7号盒子中
